_comment: Configuration file for the UAV Brain Link Tool (BLT)

commandScriptInfo._comment: Python script path and strings to execute specific mental commands

uavInfo._comment: Variables for configuring the Python script that controls the UAV

userInfo._comment: User information for obtaining profile information and logging into Emotiv

commandThresholds._comment: Asymmetrical power thresholds above and below (respectively) which the program considers a mental command active or inactive
